cities.name: Marrakech
cities.description: Pearl of the South with vibrant souks, palaces, and lush gardens.

cities.name: Fes
cities.description: Imperial city home to the world's oldest university.

cities.name: Zanzibar
cities.description: Paradisiacal archipelago with rich Swahili heritage.

cities.name: Arusha
cities.description: Gateway to Tanzania's northern safari circuit.

cities.name: Dakar
cities.description: Vibrant city blending tradition and modernity.

cities.name: Saint-Louis
cities.description: Former colonial capital with vintage charm.

cities.name: Gondar
cities.description: Ancient imperial city with medieval castles.

historical_sites.name: Pyramids of Meroe
historical_sites.description: Royal necropolis of the Kingdom of Kush (300 BC).

historical_sites.name: Ruins of Carthage
historical_sites.description: Remains of the Punic city that rivaled Rome.

historical_sites.name: Timbuktu
historical_sites.description: Historic intellectual center with precious manuscripts.

beaches.name: Bazaruto Archipelago
beaches.description: Pristine white sand dunes and crystal-clear waters.

national_parks.name: Kruger National Park
national_parks.description: One of Africa's largest game reserves.

national_parks.name: Virunga National Park
national_parks.description: Africa's oldest park with mountain gorillas.

cultural_experiences.name: Cape Town Carnival
cultural_experiences.description: Colorful parade inspired by Rio's carnival.

unesco_sites.name: Omo Valley
unesco_sites.significance: Prehistoric site and unique tribal cultures
